original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3511)@</color>從地面激起四叢冰柱攻擊敵人，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3511)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3511)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成傷害，同時降低敵人的移動速度。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3511)@</color> Stir up four icicles from the ground to attack the enemy with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str( 3511)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3511)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> cause damage, at the same time Reduce the movement speed of the enemy.
